metadata.title: Naqvi pays homage to martyred traffic police personnel

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jan 12 (APP): Federal Minister for Interior Mohsin Naqvi on Sunday paid homage to Traffic Police personnel Zubair Shah, who was martyred in a firing incident by unidentified assailants in Sector I-9, in the federal capital. In a statement, the minister expressed his heartfelt condolence to the bereaved family, saying, aWe stand with the grieving family in this hour of sorrow.a He also urged for the immediate arrest of the culprits, directing authorities to bring them to justice swiftly and ensure that Zubair Shahas family receives justice. Furthermore, Mohsin Naqvi assured that the government would take full care of the martyrsa family.
content.summary: Federal Minister for Interior Mohsin Naqvi paid homage to Traffic Police personnel Zubair Shah, who was martyred in a firing incident. The minister expressed his condolences and assured that the government would take full care of Zubair's family.
